tip.lightingwand.noShimmer: Shimmer not installed. Custom color is unavailable.
lightingwand.spellpiece.trick_conjure_in: Conjures a light in the given position. Only having CAD in hand can see the bounding box. The second parameter is light value.
lightingwand.config.energyPerUse.desc: How much FE to repair one use of wand. Zero to disable.
lightingwand.config.repairRecipe.desc: Should use glowstone dust to repair wand.
lightingwand.config.shootProjectile.desc: Should wand be able to shoot projectile.
